name: Credit Card Validator
body:
### Welcome to Credit Card Validator
This is a JavaScript credit card number validator for Visa, American Express, Discover, Mastercard, and JCB.

To checkout this project using git use the following commands.
```
$ git clone git@github.com:bluestealth/credit-card-validator.git
$ cd credit-card-validator
```
To use in your node project just use the following command.
```
$ npm install --save credit-card-validator
```
### Authors and Contributors
This project is written by Michael Dempsey (@bluestealth)

### Support or Contact
If you are having problems you can create an issue on our github page, which is also where the documentation is located [credit-card-validator](https://github.com/bluestealth/credit-card-validator).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
